name: SuperBladePro Presets File
summary: A Q5Q file contains presets used by SuperBladePro, a program used to create 2D and 3D surface and texture effects, such as metal, gel, and glass. It stores effects settings customized by a user or packaged with the plugin that are applied to images and text. Q5Q files are typically distributed in .ZIP files with several other files, including .BMP images and "readme" .TXT files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Corel PaintShop Pro with SuperBladePro plugin

macos.display_name: Corel PaintShop Pro with SuperBladePro plugin
